title: Work done on object by variable force - comparison

content.question: A block sits at rest on a horizontal surface where friction between the block and the surface is negligible. The block experiences a force <math alttext="vector F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mover><mi>F</mi><mo>⇀</mo></mover></math> that varies with the magnitude of the displacement <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> of the block such that <math alttext="vector F equals k x squared i hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mover accent="true"><mi>F</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mover accent="true"><mi>i</mi><mo>^</mo></mover></mstyle></math>. The work done by the force on the block as it is displaced to <math alttext="x equals 5 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="W sub 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></mstyle></math>, and the work done on the block as it is displaced to <math alttext="x equals 10 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math> is <math alttext="W sub 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>10</mn></msub></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is the correct value of <math alttext="the ratio W sub 10 to W sub 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mo> </mo><mo>:</mo><mo> </mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
